stimulusHtml: Given that h = 17 at time t = 0, solve the differential equation  d h d t = − h 5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4153@  for h as a function of t.

features.html: A coffeepot has the shape of a cylinder with radius 5 inches, as shown in the figure above. Let h be the depth of the coffee in the pot, measured in inches, where h is a function of time t, measured in seconds. The volume V of coffee in the pot is changing at the rate of  − 5 π h MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DAC@ cubic inches per second. (The volume V of a cylinder with radius r and height h is  V = π r 2 h MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FB0@ .)
